sn14.3:1.2: “Dhatunanattam, bhikkhave, paticca uppajjati phassananattam, no phassananattam paticca uppajjati dhatunanattam.
sn14.3:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, dhatunanattam paticca uppajjati phassananattam, no phassananattam paticca uppajjati dhatunanattam?
sn14.3:2.2: Cakkhudhatum, bhikkhave, paticca uppajjati cakkhusamphasso, no cakkhusamphassam paticca uppajjati cakkhudhatu …pe…
sn14.3:2.3: manodhatum paticca uppajjati manosamphasso, no manosamphassam paticca uppajjati manodhatu.
sn14.3:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, dhatunanattam paticca uppajjati phassananattam, no phassananattam paticca uppajjati dhatunanattan”ti.
